1.content: Here are the lovely ladies, you can make the names
1.title: Characters

choices: She starts off with on an argument with her cellmate, Karissa.
Some guards want to have a few words with the newbie.
11.content:
Anna was a college student. She did theater and was the artsy type; rather short with short red hair, a round face but a tight figure. She always looked pouty, which made sense for being in prison. One night on an outing with her girls, they got a little took drunk and ended up stealing a car, ditching Anna at the end and landing her a year in the joint. She was fairly grumpy about this. But, she tried to be hopeful in knowing it was only a year, and tried staying out a trouble.

However, that definitely was going to be a problem here.
11.title: Short red head Low Sec

choices: A few of the stronger inmates decide to see how tough this girl is.
On a rare day off, she wrecks vengeance.
A few female guards want to have some fun with the geeky looking girl.
12.content: Melanie was a hot-head, literally and figuratively. She had bright red curly hair that was always worn up often over a bright blue bandana, and a generally ginger complexion that belayed a pissy looking face. Out of everything that she looked, no one would have figured that she was a hacker; much less one of the prominent 'internet terrorists' who'd taken it into her own hands to push her rather loud feminist agenda, as well as stealing funds from as many banks that she could get her mitts into. And since she'd stolen up to hundreds of thousands, she was locked in her solitary cell, for 30 years. So, she might as well get used to it at the age of 24.
12.title: Tall red head Max Sec

choices: The stronger inmates decide to fuck with her.
She attempts to be a giver, for once.
She gets thrown in solitary by some guards, having to face her shit for once.
14.content: Megan played soccer, and was the sport type. She was rather spindly and always looked rather surprised, but she had a fierce temper that she took out on anyone stupid enough to cross her. Which was a surprising amount of people. Unfortunately for her, that temper got the best of her when she spit in the face of a cop who accused her of drunk driving, and then attempted to punch him in the face. One thing lead to another, and now she had a year to serve in this shit-hole. At least the yard was nice.
14.title: Tall Brunette Min Sec

choices: She decides to take out some frustration on her roommate Anna.
A  bunch of stronger inmates team up with her, take her to the fence in the yard
She decides to try to nag someone to be her bodyguard.
152.content: Karissa was a very pissy girl. She had rather creamy skin with a small scattering of acne, and short hair in two ponytails. She was a DJ at her college before making the mistake of airing a certain obscene song on air, and found jailtime when the radio station refused to back her. It was only a year, but she wasn't happy about it. Being small she was definitely a target, and being the pretty, perky looking type meant there were plenty of grumpier inmates looking to knock her down a peg, when she was already down in the dumps.
152.title: Short Blonde Low Sec

choices: Go find that new girl, Anna, and try her out.
She hangs out in the yard, eyeing the skinny bitches walking around.
A guard is tired of her bullshit.
153.content: Introduce yourself to Bodie! Or, she'll introduce herself to you. Bodie was 24, and dealt drugs. Clearly, this didn't work out for her very well. She was the geeky type with a busty chest and a rather nice curvy frame, and here came off as a rather common prison dyke. She was in for 5 years, so she just had to ride it out until something better came along. At least she was able to entertain herself, especially by taking advantage of the other, often weaker members of the prison. And how would her day go today?
153.title: Busty Black haired

choices: She chats up her cellmate Kara, to learn the whole deal!
She has a run in with Bodie, her near opposite in every way!
Being new blood, another angry girl runs into her!
154.content: Penelope was latino; rather short and flat-chested to go along with that, including very short slightly boyish looking black hair. However, she had a round perky face as well as perky hips, so she at least still looked like a chick. She'd gotten in trouble for a protest when things got rough in the city; due to no fault of her own she was shoved around and ended up literally getting her ass kicked, as well as getting arrested after another girl had fiercely ripped her pants off leaving her indecent, so she was here for at least a year. But, she wanted to make friends! See how that goes for her.
154.title: Underdeveloped Black haired

155.content: How's this for a scenario? A girl with a serious wedgie fetish hears about this prison and the wedgies the inmate get. She purposely gets herself in trouble and sent there to dish out and take some wedgies for herself. Sound good?
155.title: Make your own

1551.content:
Well let's make a character first then.

First up is Lexi. Lexi was your every day normal College girl. She got average grades and had average assets, a normal ass and breasts with shoulder length black hair and brown eyes and only 5'4. The difference was, she had a huge wedgie fetish. She loved wedgies a lot. So when she heard there was a prison for delinquents being "reeducated" with wedgies she wasted no time getting sent there, by robbing her friend's car of course. After being caught, and saying good bye to her Mother (Who knew and shared her fetish) she was sent off to prison in a big pair of white granny panties with prison fatigues.

Jessica however is different, yet the same. She is a beast of a woman, highly athletic, nice muscles, 6ft, and blonde hair. She is a guard at the prison and wears large tighty whities with her name on it and her guard uniform. She also has a wedgie fetish and there are often times where she would allow prisoners to wedgie her when she was feeling bored. The prison was a dream for Jessica so she was quite content to help improve girls lives while at the same time giving and getting wedgies
1551.title: Let's do it!

15522.content:
Lauren is a security guard that works at Wedgie Worth that is a petite 5’6, brunnete, b-breasts, average ass, but a cute face with chocolate eyes. She was a timid nerd back during her school days and this bled into her life as a prison guard as well. She is timid, nervous, and some would say spineless. She’s not so strong and she’s often bullied by her fellow guards.
